title: The young divines apologie for his continuance in the Vniuersitie with certaine meditations, ritten by Nathaniel Povvnoll, late student of Christ-Church in Oxford.
author: Pownall, Nathaniel, 1583 or 4-1610.
publicationStmtDate: 1612. And are to be sold in Pauls Churchyard: by Matthevv Lovvnes at the signe of the Bishops head.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Cantrell Legge printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge,
